name.ja: <ruby>双<rt>そう</rt></ruby><ruby>天<rt>てん</rt></ruby>の<ruby>獅使<rt>つかわしめ</rt></ruby>－<ruby>阿<rt>あ</rt></ruby><ruby>吽<rt>うん</rt></ruby>

text.en:
2 "Dual Avatar" monsters
This card gains these effects based on the original names of the Fusion Materials used for its Summon.
● "Dual Avatar - Empowered Kon-Gyo": If your "Dual Avatar" monster battles, its ATK becomes 3000 during damage calculation only.
● "Dual Avatar - Empowered Mitsu-Jaku": Once per opponent's turn (Quick Effect): You can target 1 card on the field; banish it.
If this Fusion Summoned card is destroyed: You can Special Summon 1 "Dual Avatar Fists - Yuhi" and 1 "Dual Avatar Feet - Kokoku" from your Deck, and if you do, they cannot be destroyed by battle or card effects this turn.
